______________comment1______________: Your bot account setting. Get Oauth at : https://twitchapps.com/tmi/ using your bot account. To give response in chat
______________comment2______________: Your main account setting. Get Token at : https://twitchtokengenerator.com/ using your main account. Scope Name needed : channel:read:redemptions channel:manage:redemptions. To monitor reward redeem
______________comment3______________: You can get this AFTER you connect to Twitch using ACNHPoker with the above setting
